Core Map Functions

Fault-tolerant replacements for purrr::map family

s_map() s_map_chr() s_map_dbl() s_map_int() s_map_lgl() s_map_dfr() s_map_dfc()

Safe PMap - Drop-in Replacement for purrr::pmap with Auto-Recovery

Safe IMap - Drop-in Replacement for purrr::imap with Auto-Recovery
